duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and communicate technical success criteria for customers by crafting detailed Technical Success Plans tailored to specific customer goals and metrics.
Collaborate with account team and Solutions Architect to provide ongoing technical coverage and support, while focusing on identifying new deals.
Ensure successful technical customer journey from onboarding to adoption, continuously driving the consumption of Elastic solutions.
Liaise between customers and support to ensure optimized support resolution experience and smooth adoption curve for the customer.
Develop a comprehensive understanding of the customer's business needs and translate these into technical requirements for Elastic solutions.
Foster ongoing customer relationships to increase their utilization of Elastic solutions, further driving annual recurring revenue (ARR).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Systems, or a related field (Master's preferred)
Validated experience in similar role such as Solutions Architect, Technical Consultant, or Presales Engineer, with hands-on experience with Elastic solutions or equivalent technologies
